attributes.action: teachers should be doing there jobs properly
attributes.additional_details: so i dont shit my self or pe thanks
attributes.background: i needed the toilet but students aint allowed to go toilets which the teachers need to call walkabout which ive been waiting for an hour no one turned up and its not fair for us.

rejection.details:
Decisions on policies regarding the use of toilets are a matter for individual schools and teachers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how a school or teacher deals with requests to use the toilet, you should raise this with the school or relevant local authority.
